text: Ani he mhanatata ki amhi ajnapalana karato parantu jevha tumacya javaluna uthuna bahera padatata, tevha tyancyatala eka gata, ji gosta tumhi kinva tyane sangitali ahe tyavirud'dha ratri sallamasalata karatata. Tyanca ratrinca vartalapa allaha lihuna gheta ahe. Tumhi tyancya bolanyakade durlaksa kara ani sarvasrestha allahavara bharosa theva. Kama banavinyasathi allaha puresa ahe
